Message:
I thought that you had
betrayed me...

That the mutual trust
we had for one another...
was nothing but an illusion.

But...I was wrong.
You tried to protect me.

The one who didn’t see that...
the one who didn’t understand
that...was me.

In the end, I was unable to
live up to your expectations.

I let everything go to waste,
even the precious documents
you entrusted to me...
Why wasn’t I able to realize it?
